targets.rawSql: SELECT SUM(size_bytes) FROM file_origins WHERE creation_time BETWEEN $__timeFrom() AND $__timeTo() AND origin_path LIKE '%/camsci1_%.xrif';
SELECT SUM(size_bytes) FROM file_origins WHERE creation_time BETWEEN $__timeFrom() AND $__timeTo() AND origin_path LIKE '%/camvisx_%.fits';
SELECT SUM(size_bytes) FROM file_origins WHERE creation_time BETWEEN $__timeFrom() AND $__timeTo() AND origin_path LIKE '%/camwfs_%.xrif';
SELECT SUM(size_bytes) FROM file_origins WHERE creation_time BETWEEN $__timeFrom() AND $__timeTo() AND origin_path LIKE '%/camflowfs_%.xrif';
SELECT SUM(size_bytes) FROM file_origins WHERE creation_time BETWEEN $__timeFrom() AND $__timeTo() AND origin_path LIKE '%/camacq_%.xrif';
SELECT SUM(size_bytes) FROM file_origins WHERE creation_time BETWEEN $__timeFrom() AND $__timeTo() AND origin_path LIKE '%/dm00disp%.xrif';

SELECT
  SUM(size_bytes)
FROM
  file_origins
WHERE
  creation_time BETWEEN $__timeFrom()
  AND $__timeTo()
  AND origin_path NOT LIKE '%.xrif';
SELECT SUM(size_bytes) FROM file_origins WHERE creation_time BETWEEN $__timeFrom() AND $__timeTo() AND origin_path LIKE '%/camsci2_%.xrif';
SELECT SUM(size_bytes) FROM file_origins WHERE creation_time BETWEEN $__timeFrom() AND $__timeTo() AND origin_path LIKE '%/camlowfs_%.xrif';
SELECT SUM(size_bytes) FROM file_origins WHERE creation_time BETWEEN $__timeFrom() AND $__timeTo() AND origin_path LIKE '%/camllowfs_%.xrif';
SELECT SUM(size_bytes) FROM file_origins WHERE creation_time BETWEEN $__timeFrom() AND $__timeTo() AND origin_path LIKE '%/camtip_%.xrif';
SELECT SUM(size_bytes) FROM file_origins WHERE creation_time BETWEEN $__timeFrom() AND $__timeTo() AND origin_path LIKE '%/dm01disp%.xrif';
SELECT SUM(size_bytes) FROM file_origins WHERE creation_time BETWEEN $__timeFrom() AND $__timeTo() AND origin_path LIKE '%/dm02disp%.xrif';

select
  ts,
  CASE
    when (msg ->> 'observing') :: bool = true THEN (msg ->> 'obsName')
    Else Null
  end as observing
from
  telem
where
  device = 'observers'
  and ts between $__timeFrom()
  AND $__timeTo();

with target as (select
  ts,
  CASE
    WHEN msg ->> 'catObj' = 'UNKNOWN'
    OR msg ->> 'catObj' = 'Pointing'
    OR msg ->> 'catObj' LIKE '%***%' THEN NULL
    ELSE msg ->> 'catObj'
  END as object,
  (SELECT DISTINCT ON (tcsitelem.ts) msg->>'domeStat'
    FROM telem as tcsitelem
    WHERE telem.device = 'tcsi'
   	and ec = 'telem_teldata'
   	AND tcsitelem.ts between $__timeFrom() AND $__timeTo() 
    AND tcsitelem.ts <= telem.ts
    ORDER BY ts DESC LIMIT 1) as val
from
  telem
where
  device = 'tcsi'
  AND ec = 'telem_telcat'
  and ts between $__timeFrom() AND $__timeTo() 
)
select ts, CASE WHEN val = '1' then object else null end as object from target;

select
  ts,
  msg->>'domeStat' as domeStat
from
  telem
where
  device = 'tcsi'
  AND ec = 'telem_teldata'
  and ts between $__timeFrom() AND $__timeTo();

WITH hours AS (
  SELECT generate_series(
           date_trunc('hour', ($__timeFrom())::timestamptz ),
           date_trunc('hour', ($__timeTo())::timestamptz ),
           interval '1 hour'
         ) AS hour
)
SELECT
  -- to_char(hours.hour, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS hour_start,
  hours.hour,
  COALESCE(SUM(file_origins.size_bytes), 0) / (60 * 60) AS camsci1
FROM
  hours
LEFT JOIN
  file_origins ON date_trunc('hour', file_origins.creation_time) = hours.hour
               AND file_origins.origin_path LIKE '%camsci1%.xrif'
GROUP BY
  hours.hour
ORDER BY
  hours.hour;

WITH hours AS (

FROM
  hours
LEFT JOIN
  file_origins ON date_trunc('hour', file_origins.creation_time) = hours.hour
               AND file_origins.origin_path LIKE '%camsci2%.xrif'
GROUP BY
  hours.hour
ORDER BY
  hours.hour;

           date_trunc('hour', ($__timeFrom())::timestamptz ),

SELECT
  -- to_char(hours.hour, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS hour_start,
  hours.hour,
  COALESCE(SUM(file_origins.size_bytes), 0) / (60 * 60) AS camflowfs

LEFT JOIN

WITH hours AS (
  SELECT generate_series(
           date_trunc('hour', ($__timeFrom())::timestamptz ),
           date_trunc('hour', ($__timeTo())::timestamptz ),
           interval '1 hour'
         ) AS hour
)
SELECT
  -- to_char(hours.hour, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS hour_start,
  hours.hour,
  COALESCE(SUM(file_origins.size_bytes), 0) / (60 * 60) AS other
FROM
  hours
LEFT JOIN
  file_origins ON date_trunc('hour', file_origins.creation_time) = hours.hour
               AND file_origins.origin_path LIKE '%.xrif'
               AND file_origins.origin_path NOT LIKE '%camsci1%.xrif'
               AND file_origins.origin_path NOT LIKE '%camsci2%.xrif'
               AND file_origins.origin_path NOT LIKE '%camwfs%.xrif'
               AND file_origins.origin_path NOT LIKE '%camlowfs%.xrif'
               AND file_origins.origin_path NOT LIKE '%camacq%.xrif'
               AND file_origins.origin_path NOT LIKE '%camtip%.xrif'
               AND file_origins.origin_path NOT LIKE '%dm00disp%.xrif'
               AND file_origins.origin_path NOT LIKE '%dm01disp%.xrif'
               AND file_origins.origin_path NOT LIKE '%dm02disp%.xrif'
GROUP BY
  hours.hour
ORDER BY
  hours.hour;

           date_trunc('hour', ($__timeFrom())::timestamptz ),

SELECT

SELECT
  creation_time,
  regexp_replace(origin_path, '^.+[/\\]', '') as filename,
  size_bytes
FROM
  file_origins
WHERE
  creation_time BETWEEN $__timeFrom()
  AND $__timeTo()
  AND origin_path LIKE '%.xrif'
  AND origin_path NOT LIKE '%camsci1_%.xrif'
  AND origin_path NOT LIKE '%camsci2_%.xrif'
  AND origin_path NOT LIKE '%camwfs_%.xrif'
  AND origin_path NOT LIKE '%camslowfs_%.xrif'
LIMIT
  100;

SELECT
  creation_time,
  regexp_replace(origin_path, '^.+[/\\]', '') as filename,
  size_bytes
FROM
  file_origins
WHERE
  creation_time BETWEEN $__timeFrom()
  AND $__timeTo()
  AND origin_path NOT LIKE '%.xrif'
  AND origin_path NOT LIKE '%.bintel'
  AND origin_path NOT LIKE '%.binlog'
LIMIT
  100;
